Gap

# Gap

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

CAUTION

`gap` requires React Native 0.71

## Compatibility

| Class             | Support        |
| ----------------- | -------------- |
| ```
gap-{n}
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
gap-[n]
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
gap-x-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
gap-x-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
gap-y-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
gap-y-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
